product.title: Puzzimals
product.description:
Cute, but challenging!
Don't let the cute look or super fun animations fool you, Puzzimals has thought-provoking puzzles that challenge players with each new level.
Puzzimals brings back those that lovers of puzzle and match 3 games love: creative puzzles and almost infinite combos.
Players can have fun over 100 levels, combining different types of squares such as ice, wild cards, bombs and more.

history.header: Puzzimals, Brazilian game in the final stages of development opens registration for open beta
history.text: In development by indie gamedev Diego Giacomelli from Porto Alegre (RS), Puzzimals started the registration phase for open beta. Scheduled to launch soon, the puzzle game will initially be released for Android, but the Apple device is also in the plans.
